Package de.weltraumschaf.commons.testing

Sub package for utilities and helpers for testing.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CapturedOutput
    This rule captures all output written to System.out and System.err.
    CapturedOutput.CapturedOutputMatcherBuilder
    Builds string matchers.
    CapturingPrintStream
    Captures the written bytes instead of printing them to any output stream.

Package de.weltraumschaf.commons.testing Description

Sub package for utilities and helpers for testing.
